name: Click on Copy Option for Leave Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Click on Copy Option for Leave Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status, defaultTab=Leave})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
When Click on "Export" button on Leave tab
And Verify Copied to Clipboard text appears

userStory.storyName: MIS Leave Management > View Request Status
userStory.displayName: MIS Leave Management > View Request Status
userStory.narrative: This tests are for View Request Status module of MIS Beta

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<defaultTab>" displays by default
When Click on "Export" button on Leave tab
Then Verify "Copy,Excel,PDF,Print" options are displayed
When Click on "Copy" export option
And Verify Copied to Clipboard text appears
